Description: 11 fragments of beads in different shapes, one of ostrich eggshell, the others made of blue faience. A: one disc-shaped bead of ostrich eggshell. B: 3 small disc beads made of blue faience. C: 2 very shallow disc-shaped beads with a large diameter and small perforation, one of them broken into 2 fragments. D: 3 cylindrical beads consisting of many small disc-shaped bead segments. E: one bead in an oval cylindrical shape.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
